selectableTree.noTrees: There are no trees available for this iModel.

errorState.title: Error
errorState.description: An error occurred while loading tree content.

filtering.noMatches: There are no categories matching filter "{{filter}}"
filtering.unknownFilterError: An unknown error occurred while filtering the tree.
filtering.tooManyFilterMatches: There are too many matches for the given filter. Please be more specific.

model.hiddenThroughModelSelector: Model display is hidden through model selector
model.someCategoriesHidden: Some categories are visible and some are hidden

category.displayedThroughCategorySelector: Category display enabled through category selector
category.hiddenThroughCategorySelector: Category display disabled through category selector
category.allElementsHidden: All category elements are in the never drawn list or none of the category elements are in the exclusive always drawn list
category.someElementsAreHidden: There are both visible and hidden elements in this category
category.allElementsVisible: All category elements are in the always drawn list

element.hiddenDueToOtherElementsExclusivelyAlway: Other elements in "exclusively always drawn" list

groupingNode.allElementsHidden: All elements are in the never drawn list or none of the elements are in the exclusive always drawn list
groupingNode.someElementsAreHidden: There are both visible and hidden elements
groupingNode.allElementsVisible: All elements are in the always drawn list

filtering.noMatches: There are no nodes matching filter "{{filter}}"
filtering.unknownFilterError: An unknown error occurred while filtering the tree.
filtering.unknownInstanceFocusError: An unknown error occurred while focusing instances. <link>Disable the focus mode</link>.
filtering.tooManyFilterMatches: There are too many matches for the given filter. Please be more specific.
filtering.tooManyInstancesFocused: There are too many elements selected for focus mode. Please select fewer elements or <link>disable the focus mode</link>.

baseTree.dataIsNotAvailable: The data required for this tree layout is not available in this iModel.

filteringDialog.failedToCalculateMatchingInstancesCount: Failed to calculate matching instances count
filteringDialog.matchingInstancesCount: Number of instances matching current filter: {{instanceCount}}
filteringDialog.filterExceedsLimit: Number of instances matching current filter exceeds the limit of {{limit}}

presentation-hierarchies.noFilteredChildren: No child nodes match current filter
presentation-hierarchies.resultLimitExceeded: There are more items than allowed limit of {{limit}}.
presentation-hierarchies.resultLimitExceededWithFiltering: Please provide <link>additional filtering</link> - there are more items than allowed limit of {{limit}}.
presentation-hierarchies.increaseHierarchyLimit: <link>Increase the hierarchy level size limit to {{limit}}.</link>
presentation-hierarchies.increaseHierarchyLimitWithFiltering: Or, <link>increase the hierarchy level size limit to {{limit}}.</link>
